reviews.text: As a responsible citizen every one of us should visit this place once.  It is a nice place. Fun place for kids too . It contains ruins of history. Loved it . The museum was closed though but will be open soon. Do visit! 😊😊

A nice place for kids. They will love the old trains and engines. The museum is also very well built and explained. Loved the engine simulators. Wish they have more counters to manage the ticket booking experience

Nice place to visit with kids. They have almost all the engines of Indian railways since beginning. Take the toy train ride for Rs 20 per person. It will show u almost all of the museum in 10 minutes ride. Monorail ride is also there. Easily reachable by cab

EXPLORE THE HISTORY OF INDIAN RAILWAYS AT NATIONAL RAIL MUSEUM
Discover the 163 years of rich Indian Railway’s historic heritage in the company of rare steam, diesel and electric locos, royal saloons and lots of artifacts. Interactive display will enhance the experience of visitors and make them understand how a single investment of Indian Railway helped in unification and progress of India as a nation.
Spend a day with your family and friends and enjoy joy and toy train rides, 3D virtual reality experiences, simulator rides, coupled with a sumptuous meal at newly built heritage restaurant.

A very good and enjoying place on centre of Delhi. It's very entertaining for all age personal with a full day trip. Reasonable price restaurant and very informative to the person who want to know any thing about the railway. The virtual reality show of railway and it's develop is too good.
Saturday evening dinner outside was great. Loved our waitress Anna! Great prices and great seating. Food was delish and well priced. Definitely coming back again.

Way better than I expected! Prices are decent and, despite having a smoking floor, there was no smoke smells in here at all! This was a concern of mine, but I’m glad I gave it a shot! The chicken fingers look pretty damn good, but I ended up getting some appetizers.

THE best lobster bisque!!  I could have ten bowls and I consider myself fairly broadly experienced as I adore bisque!  Great chunks of lobster, prices are SUPER reasonable and service is extremely welcoming.  We had a quick meeting in town but this was a highlight meal of our whole trip.
I got food poising here (and still want to come back) that's how delicious the Hand Dipped Corn Dogs are. However, if cigar smoke bothers you... I would ask to be seated outside.
The kitchen was closed temporarily while a piece of equipment was being repaired but my meal still came out promptly and was delicious.
Very nice staff and the food was excellent. Didn't take long to arrive and was hot and fresh. Pretty consistent ordering at Pizza Express. There is a takeaway option also if you need to dash.
Very good pizza. Perfect service. I will come back for sure ;).
Such good food! At first it looks like a fast food restaurant but the food is really good quality and tasty!
Good pizza, slow service.
Delicious food. Friendly, helpful staff.

So salty and spicy I can’t finish my overpriced meal. The “lamb” tasted old too. I am usually very forgiving about stuff like this, but not today, and they use microwaves.  Next day: I was pooping water all day and now I’m dehydrated.

First time after countless walk by’s. Honestly a bit underwhelmed by the front ( as mentioned by others the bathroom sink totally caught me off guard but at least it has somewhere to wash up 😆) clearly is labeled that everything is self serve and hey that’s not for everyone. I ordered for three to go and the dishes were great, spicy is advertised not correctly it’s on a volcanic level! The chicken was great and the lamb even better and the samosas were wonderful (as well as the accompaniments) without a doubt I will return to try different entrees ( but I won’t be dinning in). Than you Luzzat for a good experience in Rogers Park!
Cute storefront restaurant that serves great Indian food. When they say spicy, they mean spicy! Very homey feeling.

The food is tasty. Great breads. You can never be sure when they will be open. You have to order at the counter and pick up your entre at the counter, it used to be table service. Water from styrofoam cups. About half their original menu is redacted from the printed menu with opaque tape. So, yummy but not a great environment. At least it is clean.

Really high quality food in very basic surroundings. Do if you seek very good northern Indian food you will find it. But unless you take it home, you will be eating on styrofoam plates with plastic silverware. 
The adventure of going there and having the food hot and fresh is worth it at least once. 
We will return there for sure. A jewel in the rough in Jarvis in Roger's Park. I recommend it!

Great place for group, dates, solo hangout. The food was great. The drinks was great. Great selection of drinks. Prices can range from Rm10-300. Take your pic. Very enjoyable place. The band tonight was awesome! The singers was lit! Very recommend to go for a night out.

Took a while until I got a menu, staff was walking past me a lot and looking at me but not doing anything, made me feel a bit weird coming there alone. Once I was able to order it was all good. The pizza was awesome!
What can i say except this place is perfect & the service is excellent. Came here countless of times. Now let's talk about the food...yes the food...they are superb!!! 😊 worth every cent
nothing much, just good vibes good songs and etc ....

5 stars for the food, 0 star for the service. The food was extremely good and the ambience is just perfect for any occasion. We came here for my mum’s birthday celebration. However, your stuffs’ attitude was terribly bad, one of the stuffs showed unwillingness and impatience when we asked her to take photos for us. That spoiled the whole dining experience tonight. As a restaurant with reputations, you should have trained your stuffs better. We customers pay for the food as well as the service that you provide, if your stuff is unwilling to serve the customers with an open heart, then she should stay out from the service line. What’s worser than horrible food? Horrible service. I would love to come back again for the food, but you don’t deserve a second chance if your stuff’s attitude remains the same.

As silver member got free upgrade to junior suite. One of the best suites i've been to. On 11 floor with balcony to the sea and great view on the city. Breakfast is also good with big variety. Recommend.
Awesome hotel. Really clean, well laid out rooms. The staff are all friendly, professional and helpful. Breakfast is amazing and the bar serves good food throughout the day. Highly recommend!

Very good location, clean rooms, very good breakfast.. There is a cosy lobby bar with friendly staff.
Fitness room is very small and hot water gets cold sometimes..
Location wise it gets all the 5 stars. Pretty clean. Friendly staff. Decent breakfast and lovely breakfast lounge. Ideally I would want a room with a view of the Caspian.
Stayed here for 1 night new years eve. Room was comfortable and clean. Located walking distance from the mall and restaurants
